name: ZX Spectrum Gamer
description: An emulator app featuring a ZX Spectrum emulator allowing users to play classic games, read vintage magazines and books, and explore historical information about the ZX Spectrum.
shortDescription: Play classic ZX Spectrum games and explore vintage magazines and historical content.

name: Treasure Island
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in Treasure Island! Explore a mysterious tropical island, defeat cunning pirates, and solve challenging puzzles to uncover hidden treasures. To find the ultimate treasure, you'll explore 20 unique locations, collect special items, and overcome clever challenges. Some locations require specific items to enter, so plan your adventure carefully and think strategically.
shortDescription: Embark on a thrilling adventure, explore a mysterious tropical island, defeat pirates, and solve puzzles to uncover hidden treasures.
features: Point-and-click adventure gameplay with fun puzzles
Explore 20 unique locations on a beautiful tropical island
Defeat pirates and collect items to progress
Optimized for devices with screen ratios between 16:10 and 21:9
Designed for players who love adventure and puzzle-solving
